sect1.title: Deal With Oddities And Corner Cases (STEP 9)
sect1.para: For many Veil2-protected database, there will be no oddities or corner-cases, for some though all of the customizations done up til now will still not be enough to give you the functionality you need.
If this is the situation you face, and you need even more customization, this is the time to do it.

In this step you will alter and extend Veil2 functionality by redefining built-in functions and views. Note that doing so comes with a certain amount of maintenance overhead. If you upgrade the Veil2 extension you will need to ensure that your redefined functions and views continue to play nicely with the rest of Veil2, and that they incorporate any changes or bugfixes that may be appropriate if and when the extension is upgraded.
